label.text: These options are MANDATORY! Especially the password.
Plugins to be preinstalled. (More plugins can be found in http://your-etherpad-domain/admin/plugins)

checkbox.name: ep_plugin/adminpads
checkbox.text: adminpads - Gives the ability to list and administrate all pads on admin page.

checkbox.name: ep_plugin/headings
checkbox.text: headings - Adds heading support to Etherpad Lite.

checkbox.name: ep_plugin/historicalsearch
checkbox.text: historicalsearch - Search through the history of documents to find when a query/search pattern or string existed.

checkbox.name: ep_plugin/offline_edit
checkbox.text: offline_edit - View your pad data even if you are disconnected from the Internets.

checkbox.name: ep_plugin/page_view
checkbox.text: page_view - Add support to do 'page view', with a toggle on/off option in Settings, also Page Breaks with Control Enter.

checkbox.name: ep_plugin/timesliderdiff
checkbox.text: timesliderdiff - See a diff view showing the changes between the latest pad and a revision.

checkbox.name: ep_plugin/webrtc
checkbox.text: webrtc - WebRTC based audio/video chat to Etherpad.
